Button Placement

Details

Buttons should be placed at the end of the content inside a page.

For action Buttons in pages containing data tables, buttons should appear fixed at the bottom inside a panel, so the user can scroll over the content whitout loosing the actions

Buttom right of the content

Call to action buttons that are placed under the page content lead the user to another experience, outside of the one they currently are.

General Guidelines

Buttons should be placed under the content at the bottom right of it.

The button to the right should be a filled button that allows the user to continue in their process once they have completed all necessary steps on the page.

The button to the left, should be an outlined Cancel button that allows the user to get out of the current experience.

If there are multiple buttons at the top, the most important or most desired action shoud be a filled in button style with the supporting buttons being outlined.
